text.tspan: Figure illustrates educational attainment (average years of total education) versus productivity (GDP per hour
Educational Attainment (average years of total education) (Barro Lee Education Dataset (2010))
Source: Feenstra et al. (2015), Penn World Table v10.0, Barro Lee Education Dataset (2010), Population (Gapminder, HYDE(2016) & UN
